newsitem.title: USA: Southern unit opens Ohio and Oregon offices.
newsitem.headline: Southern unit opens Ohio and Oregon offices.

text.p: Southern Co said Tuesday its Southern Energy Inc unit has named managers to oversee newly opened business development offices in Columbus, Ohio, and Eugene, Ore.
Louis Jahn will manage the Columbus office, and Lisa Johnson will direct the Eugene office, Southern said.
Before joining Southern Energy in August 1996, Jahn spent 14 years at American Electric Power Co Inc in Columbus as principal rate consultant and as rate research and design manager.

Johnson joined Southern Energy in June 1995 as marketing manager for the New England region. Before that, she spent five years with DuPont Co as maintenance supervisor and plant engineer at one of Du Pont's chemical plants. She also worked for DuPont in Wilmington, Del., as an energy consultant.
Southern said Johnson's will take over its Northwest marketing office which previously was located in Vancouver, Wash. ((-- New York Newsdesk 212-859-1610.))
